sentences.sentence: I need some time to change the snaffle.
sentences.translation: 我需要一些时间来换马嚼子。

sentences.sentence: In China anxious buyers queue to snaffle yet-to-be-built apartments.
sentences.translation: 而在中国，焦虑的买家们排队去购买还未建的公寓。

sentences.sentence: Michael Stich then proceeded to snaffle the $2 million first prize.
sentences.translation: 接着，迈克尔·斯蒂克又一举拿下了两百万美元的头奖。
